languages.text: "Что вы, на всех палубах вдоволь святилищ, где ваши подданные усердно молятся, а духовенство бдительно следит за крепостью их веры. Здесь же — " {n}Преподобный обводит рукой сверкающий реликварий.{/n} "Святая святых, куда дозволено ступать только самым благородным вашим слугам".

"Why, no, there are multiple sancta on every deck, where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This, on the other hand—" {n}He gestures around at the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holiest of holy places, where only the noblest among your servants are permitted to set foot."
languages.original_text: "Что вы, на всех палубах вдоволь святилищ, где ваши подданные усердно молятся, а духовенство бдительно следит за крепостью их веры. Здесь же — " {n}Преподобный обводит рукой сверкающий реликварий.{/n} "Святая святых, куда дозволено ступать только самым благородным вашим слугам".

traits.locale_text: "Why, no, there are plenty of sancta on every deck where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This place, on the other hand—" {n}The reverend sweeps his arm around the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holy of holies where only the noblest among your servants are allowed to set foot."

"Why, no, there are plenty of sancta on every deck where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This place, on the other hand—" {n}The reverend sweeps his arm around the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holy of holies where only the noblest among your servants are allowed to set foot."

"Why, no, there are multiple sancta on every deck, where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This, on the other hand—" {n}The reverend gestures around at the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holiest of holy places, where only the noblest among your servants are permitted to set foot."

"Why, no, there are multiple sancta on every deck, where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This, on the other hand—" {n}The reverend gestures around at the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holiest of holy places, where only the noblest among your servants are permitted to set foot."

"Why, no, there are multiple sancta on every deck, where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This, on the other hand—" {n}He gestures around at the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holiest of holy places, where only the noblest among your servants are permitted to set foot."

"Why, no, there are multiple sancta on every deck, where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This, on the other hand—" {n}He gestures around at the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holiest of holy places, where only the noblest among your servants are permitted to set foot."

languages.text: « Bien sûr que non. Il y a sur chaque pont de nombreux sanctuaires où vos sujets prient avec ardeur, sous l'œil vigilant du clergé qui surveille la force de leur foi. Ici, cependant, {n}ajoute-t-il en montrant le reliquaire étincelant d'un grand geste de la main,{/n} nous nous trouvons dans le lieu le plus sacré de tous, où seuls les plus nobles de vos serviteurs ont le droit de mettre les pieds. »
languages.original_text: "Why, no, there are multiple sancta on every deck, where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This, on the other hand—" {n}He gestures around at the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holiest of holy places, where only the noblest among your servants are permitted to set foot."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr que non. Il y a sur chaque pont de nombreux sanctuaires où vos sujets prient avec ardeur, sous l'œil vigilant du clergé qui surveille la force de leur foi. Ici, cependant, {n}ajoute-t-il en montrant le reliquaire étincelant d'un grand geste de la main,{/n} nous nous trouvons dans le lieu le plus sacré de tous, où seuls les plus nobles de vos serviteurs ont le droit de mettre les pieds. »

languages.text: «Oh, no; hay numerosos santuarios en cada cubierta donde sus súbditos rezan con fervor y el clero vela rigurosamente por la firmeza de su devoción. Este, por otro lado...». {n}Señala con un amplio gesto la totalidad del esplendoroso relicario.{/n} «... es el lugar más sagrado de todos, donde solo sus más nobles siervos tienen permitida la entrada».
languages.original_text: "Why, no, there are multiple sancta on every deck, where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This, on the other hand—" {n}He gestures around at the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holiest of holy places, where only the noblest among your servants are permitted to set foot."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, no; hay numerosos santuarios en cada cubierta donde sus súbditos rezan con fervor y el clero vela rigurosamente por la firmeza de su devoción. Este, por otro lado...». {n}Señala con un amplio gesto la totalidad del esplendoroso relicario.{/n} «... es el lugar más sagrado de todos, donde solo sus más nobles siervos tienen permitida la entrada».

languages.text: “并非如此，每层甲板上都有很多礼拜堂。您的臣民会在那里热忱地祈祷，而神职人员会密切留意他们的信仰是否坚定。至于这里——”{n}他指了指闪闪发光的圣骨匣。{/n}“——是所有圣所中最神圣的地方。只有您最受尊重的那些仆人，才允许踏足此地。”
languages.original_text: "Why, no, there are multiple sancta on every deck, where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This, on the other hand—" {n}He gestures around at the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holiest of holy places, where only the noblest among your servants are permitted to set foot."

traits.locale_text: “并非如此，每层甲板上都有很多礼拜堂。您的臣民会在那里热忱地祈祷，而神职人员会密切留意他们的信仰是否坚定。至于这里——”{n}他指了指闪闪发光的圣骨匣。{/n}“——是所有圣所中最神圣的地方。只有您最受尊重的那些仆人，才允许踏足此地。”

languages.text: 「いえいえ、どの甲板にも複数の聖域があり、臣民はそこで熱心に祈り、聖職者は彼らの信仰の堅固さを注意深く見守っています。一方、これは…」{n}彼は、きらびやかな聖遺物を見回した。{/n}「聖なる中でも聖なる場所であり、あなたの召使の中で最も優秀な者だけが足を踏み入れることが可能です」
languages.original_text: "Why, no, there are multiple sancta on every deck, where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This, on the other hand—" {n}He gestures around at the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holiest of holy places, where only the noblest among your servants are permitted to set foot."

traits.locale_text: 「いえいえ、どの甲板にも複数の聖域があり、臣民はそこで熱心に祈り、聖職者は彼らの信仰の堅固さを注意深く見守っています。一方、これは…」{n}彼は、きらびやかな聖遺物を見回した。{/n}「聖なる中でも聖なる場所であり、あなたの召使の中で最も優秀な者だけが足を踏み入れることが可能です」

languages.text: "Aber nein, es gibt auf jedem Deck mehrere Heiligtümer, in denen Eure Untertanen fieberhaft beten und der Klerus die Festigkeit ihres Glaubens prüfend beobachtet. Das dagegen"{n}, er deutet auf das glitzernde Reliquiar,{/n} "ist der heiligste aller heiligen Orte, den nur die edelsten Eurer Diener betreten dürfen."
languages.original_text: "Why, no, there are multiple sancta on every deck, where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This, on the other hand—" {n}He gestures around at the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holiest of holy places, where only the noblest among your servants are permitted to set foot."

traits.locale_text: "Aber nein, es gibt auf jedem Deck mehrere Heiligtümer, in denen Eure Untertanen fieberhaft beten und der Klerus die Festigkeit ihres Glaubens prüfend beobachtet. Das dagegen"{n}, er deutet auf das glitzernde Reliquiar,{/n} "ist der heiligste aller heiligen Orte, den nur die edelsten Eurer Diener betreten dürfen."

languages.text: "Hayır, her bir güvertede tebaalarınızın şevkle dua edebileceği ve din görevlilerinin bu kişilerin inançlarının sağlamlığını yakından takip edebileceği çok sayıda dinî mekân bulunmakta. Öte yandan burası..." {n}Işıl ışıl kutsal emanet odasını işaret ediyor.{/n} "...Kutsal yerlerin en kutsalıdır ve buraya hizmetkârlarınızın yalnızca en soylularının adım atmasına izin verilir."
languages.original_text: "Why, no, there are multiple sancta on every deck, where your subjects pray fervently and the clergy keeps a close watch on the firmness of their faith. This, on the other hand—" {n}He gestures around at the glittering reliquary.{/n} "—is the holiest of holy places, where only the noblest among your servants are permitted to set foot."
